nodes.name: redeemReward

constructor.details: Need to deploy DPoS contract first before deploying SGN contract

isOwner().return: true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.

pause().details: called by the owner to pause, triggers stopped state

paused().return: true if the contract is paused, false otherwise.

redeemReward(bytes).details: The rewards include both the service reward and mining rewardSGN contract acts as an interface for users to redeem mining rewards

params._rewardRequest: reward request bytes coded in protobuf

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

params._amount: subscription fee paid along this function call in CELR tokens

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

unpause().details: called by the owner to unpause, returns to normal state

updateSidechainAddr(bytes).details: Note that the "sidechain address" here means the address in the offchain sidechain system, which is different from the sidechain contract address

params._sidechainAddr: the new address in the offchain sidechain system

devdoc.title: Sidechain contract of State Guardian Network

drainToken(uint256).notice: Onwer drains one type of tokens when the contract is paused

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.

userdoc.notice: This contract implements the mainchain logic of Celer State Guardian Network sidechain
